description: Enjoy this easy and nutritionally approved raspberry cheesecake recipe for a healthier dessert the whole family will love.
keywords: Cheesecake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Raspberry,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Raspberry Cheesecake Pots Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup pitted dried dates, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place oats and almond spread in a medium baking dish and mix well to combine. Bake for 8 minutes or until golden, stirring halfway through cooking time. Cool for 10 minutes, then transfer to food processor.
Add dates to oat mixture and process for 20 seconds or until crumbs form. Divide mixture among 4 x 1 1/2-cup capacity serving glasses.
Place yoghurt, ricotta, honey and vanilla in a clean food processor and process for 30 seconds or until very smooth. Spoon yoghurt mixture over oat mixture.
Place half the raspberries in a clean food processor and process for 30 seconds or until smooth. Spoon raspberry puree over yoghurt mixture. Serve pots topped with remaining raspberries.
